name: asciify

options.name: width
options.description: The width in characters of the ascii result. Default is `100`.

options.name: height
options.description: The height in characters of the ascii result. Default is 50.

options.name: inverted
options.description: Decides if the character set is reversed (darker = denser character). True by default.

description: Turns an image into a bunch of ascii characters.
